SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.material_name, m.deadline, m.actual_deadline, m.director, m.is_force_end, m.is_all_textbook_published, m.is_deleted, m.is_published, m.founder_id FROM material m LEFT JOIN material_contact c ON m.id = c.material_id LEFT JOIN material_project_editor p ON p.material_id = m.id LEFT JOIN textbook e ON e.material_id = m.id LEFT JOIN pmph_user u ON m.director = u.id WHERE m.is_deleted = FALSE
AND (m.director = #{parameter.userId} OR p.editor_id = #{parameter.userId} OR e.planning_editor = #{parameter.userId})
AND m.material_name LIKE concat('%',#{parameter.materialName},'%')
AND c.contact_user_name LIKE concat('%',#{parameter.contactUserName},'%')
AND m.is_all_textbook_published = #{parameter.isAllTextbookPublished} AND m.is_force_end = #{parameter.isForceEnd} AND m.is_published = #{parameter.isPublished}
ORDER BY m.actual_deadline DESC, m.gmt_create DESC) t
